## packRsc() function

Pack [entries](./rsc-tools.rscentry.md) into an RSC file

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function packRsc(entries: MaybeEmptyRscEntry[]): ArrayBuffer;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  entries | [MaybeEmptyRscEntry](./rsc-tools.maybeemptyrscentry.md)<!-- -->\[\] | Entries to compose |

**Returns:**

ArrayBuffer

The RSC file

## Remarks

Unlike [unpackRsc()](./rsc-tools.unpackrsc.md)<!-- -->, the resulting buffer is not a view. It may be safely modified.
